message: They are safe in GODS arms now. So sad this happened. Horrible tragedy but they are still together. They should have been here on earth with their wonderful family. Such a sad outcome.

This is ridiculous. These animals lived before we did and have done amazing on their own. Whoever is saying that this is helping keep the population down are idiots. The people hunting don't even live where the animals are being hunted! Those animals live in Africa away from population not America. Who the hell are we to just kill another peaceful species without good reason. I hope these people become a Lion's snack.
